ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:29:33 [Issue ID 4000-131194] urn:comicvine:4000-131194 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 10:06:28. [Issue ID 116705]
ComicInfo.Summary: In a desperate bid to become a better parent, Doc takes it upon himself to confront the father of Zephyr's baby. Meanwhile, Gaia and Zephyr have a long overdue talk, and Celeste has some shocking news for Rusty. Argentinian artist Andres Ponce illustrates the back-up story, which details the events that led up to Zephyr's pregnancy.
ComicInfo.Title: Family Secrets, Part Four; Grown Ups
ComicInfo.Penciller: Andres Ponce,Ian Richardson,Michael Avon Oeming,Phil Hester
ComicInfo.Inker: Andres Ponce,Andy Park,Ian Richardson,Michael Avon Oeming
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andy Park,Chris Sotomayor,James Brown (J. Brown),Michael Avon Oeming,Phil Hester
